filesUpload.textInstructionDefault:
Drag and drop or 
 <u>upload a file</u>
filesUpload.instruction: <u>Click to upload</u> or drag and drop
filesUpload.uploadImageNumberInfo: Upload up to {count, plural, =1 {# image} other {# images}}
filesUpload.uploadFileNumberInfo: Upload up to {count, plural, =1 {# file} other {# files}}
filesUpload.uploadFileNumberAndSizeInfo: Upload up to {count, plural, =1 {# file} other {# files}} (max. {size}MB)
filesUpload.maxSizeMessage: One or more {type} are larger than {size}MB.
filesUpload.invalidFormatsMessage: Unsupported format. Please choose images with following formats: {formats}
